ai-iti58:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti58:2.3_0: Craving for sensual pleasures, craving for continued existence, and craving to end existence.
ai-iti58:3.1_0: “Bound by craving, minds full of desire
ai-iti58:3.2_0: for rebirth in this or that state,
ai-iti58:3.3_0: Yoked by Māra’s yoke, these people
ai-iti58:4.1_0: Those who have given up craving,
ai-iti58:4.2_0: rid of craving for rebirth in this or that state,
ai-iti58:4.3_0: They are those in the world who’ve crossed over,
ai-iti58:4.4_0: Those who have ended the defilements.
ai-iti58:5.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
